title.narrative: Support for Horn of Africa Drought 2011

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides support for the Horn of Africa Drought Appeal, specifically: United Nations Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) for the Regional Crisis Appeal for the Somali Displaced Crisis; World food Program (WFP) for relief operations to provide emergency food rations to those affected by drought in Ethiopia, Kenya and Somalia; Australian Non Government Organisations (NGOs) - Save the Children, Oxfam, PLAN, CARE, World Vision and Caritas to support their emergency operations in Somalia, Ethiopia and northern Kenya; International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) for activities including distribution of emergency food rations in south Somalia, reinforcing staffing at therapeutic feeding centres, child and mother health clinics and mobile clinics; and United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) for relied and humanitarian operations in Somalia in sectors such as nutrition, health, water and sanitation, education and child protection.
